abstract: European antitrust regulators have given their blessing to the $41 billion merger of healthcare giants Merck and Schering-Plough.
snippet: European antitrust regulators have given their blessing to the $41 billion merger of healthcare giants Merck and Schering-Plough.
lead_paragraph: European antitrust regulators have given their blessing to the $41 billion merger of healthcare giants Merck and Schering-Plough.
